page.title: 19FAMILY LIFE
page.content: Every morning when I wake up I make my bed get washed and feed the guinea pigs. After I have fed the guinea pigs, mummy sometimes goes shopping. I go with her. When we get home I help mummy in the house. Then after lunch we take the dogs for a long walk. We have two alsations. If daddy is in the garden my sister and I go and give him a hand. Sometimes we get the Barbie dolls and Sindy dolls out to play together. We get the garden set out for the dolls and we play camping games. When we have finished playing the games we take the dogs for another walk and get more guinea food and when we come back we help mummy with the tea. We have a salad so I wash the lettuce, cut up the tomatoes, peel and the slice the cucumber and shell the boiled eggs. For pudding we have peaches, ice-cream and jelly.
